thread.title: Argentina nº 016 - LAGUNA NIMEZ!

title: Argentina nº 016 - LAGUNA NIMEZ!
text: LAGOA NIMEZ - EL CALAFATE ! NIMEZ LAGOON - EL CALAFATE ! One more picture taken while walking along the Waterfront Avenue (Via Costanera / Via Costeira), looking towards a preserved natural area, by the city of EL CALAFATE! EL CALAFATE - THE NAME OF THAT TOWN - IS A LOCAL BERRY! "Berberis microphylla, common name Box-leaved Barberry[1] and Magellan Barberry, in Spanish Calafate, is an evergreen shrub, with simple, shiny box-like leaves. The Calafate is native to southern Argentina and Chile and is a symbol of Patagonia." Wikipedia 1982 posts here on TE! Back in 1982, I was 17 years old! I was in high school and I was an exchange student in the USA! Great memories! Some picture data:
